017package com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.ycwcm;
018
019import com.badlogic.gdx.Gdx;
020import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color;
021import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.GL20;
022import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Mesh;
023import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture;
024import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttribute;
025import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttributes;
026import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch;
027import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion;
028import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram;
029import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Affine2;
030import com.badlogic.gdx.math.MathUtils;
031import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4;
032import com.badlogic.gdx.utils.NumberUtils;
033import com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.FloatColors;
034
035import java.nio.Buffer;
036
037/**
038 * A substitute for {@link com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch} that adds an additional attribute to store an
039 * extra color's worth of channels, used to modify the luma and chromatic channels of a color by multiplication (called
040 * the "tweak") while the primary color affects the color additively (just called the color, often drawn from
041 * {@link Palette} or generated with {@link FloatColors}).
042 * <br>
043 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 12/14/2019.
044 */
045public class ColorfulBatch implements Batch {
046    public static final int SPRITE_SIZE = 24;
047    public static final String TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE = "a_tweak";
048
049    private Mesh mesh;
050
051    private final float[] vertices;
052    private int idx = 0;
053    private Texture lastTexture = null;
054    private float invTexWidth = 0, invTexHeight = 0;
055
056    private boolean drawing = false;
057
058    private final Matrix4 transformMatrix = new Matrix4();
059    private final Matrix4 projectionMatrix = new Matrix4();
060    private final Matrix4 combinedMatrix = new Matrix4();
061
062    private boolean blendingDisabled = false;
063    private int blendSrcFunc = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
064    private int blendDstFunc = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
065    private int blendSrcFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
066    private int blendDstFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
067
068    private final ShaderProgram shader;
069    private ShaderProgram customShader = null;
070    private boolean ownsShader;
071
072    protected float color = Palette.GRAY;
073    private final Color tempColor = new Color(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1f);
074
075    /**
076     * A constant packed float that can be assigned to this ColorfulBatch's tweak with {@link #setTweak(float)} to make
077     * all of the tweak adjustments virtually imperceptible. When this is set as the tweak, it won't change the luma
078     * multiplier or luma contrast, and it won't change either chromatic value multiplier.
079     */
080    public static final float TWEAK_RESET = ColorTools.ycwcm(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
081    protected float tweak = TWEAK_RESET;
082
083    /** Number of render calls since the last {@link #begin()}. **/
084    public int renderCalls = 0;
085
086    /** Number of rendering calls, ever. Will not be reset unless set manually. **/
087    public int totalRenderCalls = 0;
088
089    /** The maximum number of sprites rendered in one batch so far. **/
090    public int maxSpritesInBatch = 0;
091
092    /** Constructs a new ColorfulBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, and the default shader.
093     * @see #ColorfulBatch(int, ShaderProgram) */
094    public ColorfulBatch() {
095        this(1000, null);
096    }
097
098    /** Constructs a ColorfulBatch with one buffer and the default shader.
099     * @see #ColorfulBatch(int, ShaderProgram)  */
100    public ColorfulBatch(int size) {
101        this(size, null);
102    }
103
104    /** Constructs a new ColorfulBatch. Sets the projection matrix to an orthographic projection with y-axis point upwards, x-axis
105     * point to the right and the origin being in the bottom left corner of the screen. The projection will be pixel perfect with
106     * respect to the current screen resolution.
107     * <p>
108     * The defaultShader specifies the shader to use. Note that the names for uniforms for this default shader are different than
109     * the ones expect for shaders set with {@link #setShader(ShaderProgram)}. See {@link #createDefaultShader()}.
110     * @param size The max number of sprites in a single batch. Max of 10922.
111     * @param defaultShader The default shader to use. This is not owned by the ColorfulBatch and must be disposed separately. */
112    public ColorfulBatch(int size, ShaderProgram defaultShader) {
113        // 65535 is max vertex index, so 65535 / 6 vertices per sprite = 10922 sprites max.
114        if (size > 10922) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can't have more than 10922 sprites per batch: " + size);
115
116        Mesh.VertexDataType vertexDataType = (Gdx.gl30 != null) ? Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexBufferObjectWithVAO : Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexArray;
117
118        mesh = new Mesh(vertexDataType, false, size * 4, size * 6,
119                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.Position, 2, ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE),
120                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE),
121                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.TextureCoordinates, 2, ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0"),
122                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE));
123
124        projectionMatrix.setToOrtho2D(0, 0, Gdx.graphics.getWidth(), Gdx.graphics.getHeight());
125
126        vertices = new float[size * SPRITE_SIZE];
127
128        int len = size * 6;
129        short[] indices = new short[len];
130        short j = 0;
131        for (int i = 0; i < len; i += 6, j += 4) {
132            indices[i] = j;
133            indices[i + 1] = (short)(j + 1);
134            indices[i + 2] = (short)(j + 2);
135            indices[i + 3] = (short)(j + 2);
136            indices[i + 4] = (short)(j + 3);
137            indices[i + 5] = j;
138        }
139        mesh.setIndices(indices);
140
141        if (defaultShader == null) {
142            shader = createDefaultShader();
143            ownsShader = true;
144        } else
145            shader = defaultShader;
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Makes a new instance of the default ShaderProgram used for this ColorfulBatch, without any {@code #version}
150     * specified in the shader source. This expects an extra attribute (relative to a normal SpriteBatch) that is used
151     * for the tweak. You may want to set the code to prepend before you call this, as with:
152     * {@code ShaderProgram.prependVertexCode = "#version 110\n";
153     * ShaderProgram.prependFragmentCode = "#version 110\n";}
154     * The actual version can be different, and may need to be different for compatibility with some hardware.
155     * @return a new instance of the default shader used by ColorfulBatch for GL2 when no shader is specified
156     */
157    public static ShaderProgram createDefaultShader () {
158        String vertexShader = "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
159                + "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
160                + "attribute vec2 " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
161                + "attribute vec4 " + TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
162                + "uniform mat4 u_projTrans;\n" //
163                + "varying vec4 v_color;\n" //
164                + "varying vec4 v_tweak;\n" //
165                + "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" //
166                + "varying float v_lightFix;\n" //
167                + "\n" //
168                + "void main()\n" //
169                + "{\n" //
170                + "   v_color = " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
171                + "   v_color.a = v_color.a * (255.0/254.0);\n" //
172                + "   v_tweak = " + TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
173                + "   v_tweak.a = pow(v_tweak.a * (255.0/254.0) + 0.5, 1.709);\n" //
174                + "   v_lightFix = 1.0 + pow(v_tweak.a, 1.41421356);\n" //
175                + "   v_texCoords = " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
176                + "   gl_Position =  u_projTrans * " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
177                + "}\n";
178        String fragmentShader =
179                "#ifdef GL_ES\n" +
180                        "#define LOWP lowp\n" +
181                        "precision mediump float;\n" +
182                        "#else\n" +
183                        "#define LOWP \n" +
184                        "#endif\n" +
185                        "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" +
186                        "varying LOWP vec4 v_color;\n" +
187                        "varying LOWP vec4 v_tweak;\n" +
188                        "varying float v_lightFix;\n" +
189                        "uniform sampler2D u_texture;\n" +
190                        "const vec3 bright = vec3(0.375, 0.5, 0.125);\n" +
191                        "void main()\n" +
192                        "{\n" +
193                        "   vec4 tgt = texture2D( u_texture, v_texCoords );\n" +
194                        "   vec3 ycc = vec3(\n" +
195                        "     (v_color.r - 0.5 + v_tweak.r * pow(dot(tgt.rgb, bright), v_tweak.a) * v_lightFix),\n" + // luma
196                        "     (v_color.g - 0.5 + (tgt.r - tgt.b) * v_tweak.g) * 2.0,\n" + // warmth
197                        "     (v_color.b - 0.5 + (tgt.g - tgt.b) * v_tweak.b) * 2.0);\n" + // mildness
198                        "   gl_FragColor = vec4( (clamp(mat3(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.625, -0.375, -0.375, -0.5, 0.5, -0.5) * ycc, 0.0, 1.0)), v_color.a * tgt.a);\n" +
199                        "}";
200
201
202        ShaderProgram shader = new ShaderProgram(vertexShader, fragmentShader);
203        if (!shader.isCompiled()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Error compiling shader: " + shader.getLog());
204        return shader;
205    }
206
207    @Override
208    public void begin () {
209        if (drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.end must be called before begin.");
210        renderCalls = 0;
211
212        Gdx.gl.glDepthMask(false);
213        if (customShader != null)
214            customShader.bind();
215        else
216            shader.bind();
217        setupMatrices();
218
219        drawing = true;
220    }
221
222    @Override
223    public void end () {
224        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before end.");
225        if (idx > 0) flush();
226        lastTexture = null;
227        drawing = false;
228
229        GL20 gl = Gdx.gl;
230        gl.glDepthMask(true);
231        if (isBlendingEnabled()) gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
232    }
233
234    @Override
235    public void setColor (Color tint) {
236        color = tint.toFloatBits();
237    }
238
239    /**
240     * Sets the additive changes to the YCwCm color, as well as the multiplicative change to the alpha.
241     * @param lumaAdd additive luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
242     * @param warmAdd additive chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
243     * @param mildAdd additive chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
244     * @param alphaMul multiplicative alpha channel, from 0 to 1; 1.0 is neutral
245     */
246    @Override
247    public void setColor (float lumaAdd, float warmAdd, float mildAdd, float alphaMul) {
248        color = ColorTools.ycwcm(lumaAdd, warmAdd, mildAdd, alphaMul);
249    }
250
251    public void setColor (final float color) {
252        setPackedColor(color);
253    }
254
255    public void setIntColor(final int color) {
256        this.color = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat(Integer.reverseBytes(color & -2));
257    }
258
259    public void setIntColor(int luma, int warm, int mild, int alpha) {
260        color = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat((alpha << 24 & 0xFE000000)
261                | (mild << 16 & 0xFF0000) | (warm << 8 & 0xFF00) | (luma & 0xFF));
262    }
263
264    @Override
265    public void setPackedColor (final float color) {
266        this.color = color;
267    }
268
269    @Override
270    public Color getColor () {
271        final int intBits = NumberUtils.floatToRawIntBits(color);
272        Color color = tempColor;
273        color.r = (intBits & 0xff) / 255f;
274        color.g = ((intBits >>> 8) & 0xff) / 255f;
275        color.b = ((intBits >>> 16) & 0xff) / 255f;
276        color.a = ((intBits >>> 24) & 0xff) / 255f;
277        return color;
278    }
279
280    @Override
281    public float getPackedColor () {
282        return color;
283    }
284
285    /**
286     * Sets the multiplicative changes to the YCwCm color, along with the contrast.
287     * @param lumaMul multiplicative luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
288     * @param warmMul multiplicative chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
289     * @param mildMul multiplicative chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
290     * @param contrast affects how lightness changes, from 0 (low contrast, cloudy look) to 1 (high contrast, sharpened look); 0.5 is neutral
291     */
292    public void setTweak (float lumaMul, float warmMul, float mildMul, float contrast) {
293        tweak = ColorTools.ycwcm(lumaMul, warmMul, mildMul, contrast);
294    }
295
296    /**
297     * Sets the tweak using a single packed YCwCm float.
298     * @see #setTweak(float, float, float, float)
299     * @param tweak a packed YCwCm float, with contrast instead of alpha
300     */
301    public void setTweak (final float tweak) {
302        this.tweak = tweak;
303    }
304    
305    public float getTweak () {
306        return tweak;
307    }
308    
309    public void setIntTweak(final int tweak) {
310        this.tweak = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat(Integer.reverseBytes(tweak & -2));
311    }
312
313    public void setIntTweak(int luma, int warm, int mild, int contrast) {
314        tweak = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat((contrast << 24 & 0xFE000000)
315                | (mild << 16 & 0xFF0000) | (warm << 8 & 0xFF00) | (luma & 0xFF));
316    }
317    /**
318     * A convenience method that sets both the color (with {@link #setColor(float)}) and the tweak (with
319     * {@link #setTweak(float)}) at the same time.
320     * @param color the additive components and alpha, as a packed float
321     * @param tweak the multiplicative components and contrast, as a packed float
322     */
323    public void setTweakedColor(final float color, final float tweak) {
324        setColor(color);
325        setTweak(tweak);
326    }
327    /**
328     * A convenience method that sets both the color (with {@link #setColor(float, float, float, float)}) and the tweak
329     * (with {@link #setTweak(float, float, float, float)}) at the same time.
330     * @param lumaAdd additive luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
331     * @param warmAdd additive chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
332     * @param mildAdd additive chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
333     * @param alphaMul multiplicative alpha channel, from 0 to 1; 1.0 is neutral
334     * @param lumaMul multiplicative luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
335     * @param warmMul multiplicative chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
336     * @param mildMul multiplicative chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
337     * @param contrast affects how lightness changes, from 0 (low contrast, cloudy look) to 1 (high contrast, sharpened look); 0.5 is neutral
338     */
339    public void setTweakedColor (final float lumaAdd, final float warmAdd,
340                                 final float mildAdd, final float alphaMul,
341                                 final float lumaMul, final float warmMul,
342                                 final float mildMul, final float contrast) {
343        setColor(lumaAdd, warmAdd, mildAdd, alphaMul);
344        setTweak(lumaMul, warmMul, mildMul, contrast);
345    }
346
347    @Override
348    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height, float scaleX,
349                      float scaleY, float rotation, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
350        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
351
352        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
353
354        if (texture != lastTexture)
355            switchTexture(texture);
356        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
357            flush();
358
359        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
360        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
361        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
362        float fx = -originX;
363        float fy = -originY;
364        float fx2 = width - originX;
365        float fy2 = height - originY;
366
367        // scale
368        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
369            fx *= scaleX;
370            fy *= scaleY;
371            fx2 *= scaleX;
372            fy2 *= scaleY;
373        }
374
375        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
376        final float p1x = fx;
377        final float p1y = fy;
378        final float p2x = fx;
379        final float p2y = fy2;
380        final float p3x = fx2;
381        final float p3y = fy2;
382        final float p4x = fx2;
383        final float p4y = fy;
384
385        float x1;
386        float y1;
387        float x2;
388        float y2;
389        float x3;
390        float y3;
391        float x4;
392        float y4;
393
394        // rotate
395        if (rotation != 0) {
396            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
397            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
398
399            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
400            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
401
402            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
403            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
404
405            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
406            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
407
408            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
409            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
410        } else {
411            x1 = p1x;
412            y1 = p1y;
413
414            x2 = p2x;
415            y2 = p2y;
416
417            x3 = p3x;
418            y3 = p3y;
419
420            x4 = p4x;
421            y4 = p4y;
422        }
423
424        x1 += worldOriginX;
425        y1 += worldOriginY;
426        x2 += worldOriginX;
427        y2 += worldOriginY;
428        x3 += worldOriginX;
429        y3 += worldOriginY;
430        x4 += worldOriginX;
431        y4 += worldOriginY;
432
433        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
434        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
435        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
436        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
437
438        if (flipX) {
439            float tmp = u;
440            u = u2;
441            u2 = tmp;
442        }
443
444        if (flipY) {
445            float tmp = v;
446            v = v2;
447            v2 = tmp;
448        }
449
450        final float color = this.color;
451        final float tweak = this.tweak;
452        final int idx = this.idx;
453        vertices[idx] = x1;
454        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
455        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
456        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
457        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
458        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
459
460        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
461        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
462        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
463        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
464        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
465        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
466
467        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
468        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
469        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
470        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
471        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
472        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
473
474        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
475        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
476        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
477        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
478        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
479        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
480        this.idx = idx + 24;
481    }
482
483    @Override
484    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth,
485                      int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
486        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
487
488        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
489
490        if (texture != lastTexture)
491            switchTexture(texture);
492        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
493            flush();
494
495        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
496        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
497        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
498        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
499        final float fx2 = x + width;
500        final float fy2 = y + height;
501
502        if (flipX) {
503            float tmp = u;
504            u = u2;
505            u2 = tmp;
506        }
507
508        if (flipY) {
509            float tmp = v;
510            v = v2;
511            v2 = tmp;
512        }
513
514        final float color = this.color;
515        final float tweak = this.tweak;
516        final int idx = this.idx;
517        vertices[idx] = x;
518        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
519        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
520        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
521        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
522        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
523
524        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
525        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
526        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
527        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
528        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
529        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
530
531        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
532        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
533        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
534        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
535        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
536        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
537
538        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
539        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
540        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
541        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
542        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
543        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
544        this.idx = idx + 24;
545    }
546
547    @Override
548    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight) {
549        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
550
551        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
552
553        if (texture != lastTexture)
554            switchTexture(texture);
555        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
556            flush();
557
558        final float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
559        final float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
560        final float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
561        final float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
562        final float fx2 = x + srcWidth;
563        final float fy2 = y + srcHeight;
564
565        final float color = this.color;
566        final float tweak = this.tweak;
567        final int idx = this.idx;
568        vertices[idx] = x;
569        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
570        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
571        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
572        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
573        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
574
575        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
576        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
577        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
578        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
579        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
580        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
581
582        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
583        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
584        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
585        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
586        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
587        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
588
589        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
590        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
591        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
592        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
593        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
594        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
595        this.idx = idx + 24;
596    }
597
598    @Override
599    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, float u, float v, float u2, float v2) {
600        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
601
602        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
603
604        if (texture != lastTexture)
605            switchTexture(texture);
606        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
607            flush();
608
609        final float fx2 = x + width;
610        final float fy2 = y + height;
611
612        final float color = this.color;
613        final float tweak = this.tweak;
614        final int idx = this.idx;
615        vertices[idx] = x;
616        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
617        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
618        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
619        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
620        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
621
622        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
623        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
624        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
625        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
626        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
627        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
628
629        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
630        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
631        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
632        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
633        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
634        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
635
636        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
637        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
638        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
639        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
640        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
641        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
642        this.idx = idx + 24;
643    }

645    @Override
646    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y) {
647        draw(texture, x, y, texture.getWidth(), texture.getHeight());
648    }
649
650    @Override
651    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
652        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
653
654        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
655
656        if (texture != lastTexture)
657            switchTexture(texture);
658        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
659            flush();
660
661        final float fx2 = x + width;
662        final float fy2 = y + height;
663        final float u = 0;
664        final float v = 1;
665        final float u2 = 1;
666        final float v2 = 0;
667
668        final float color = this.color;
669        final float tweak = this.tweak;
670        final int idx = this.idx;
671        vertices[idx] = x;
672        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
673        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
674        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
675        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
676        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
677
678        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
679        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
680        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
681        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
682        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
683        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
684
685        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
686        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
687        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
688        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
689        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
690        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
691
692        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
693        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
694        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
695        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
696        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
697        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
698        this.idx = idx + 24;
699    }
700
701    /**
702     * This is very different from the other overloads in this class; it assumes the float array it is given is in the
703     * format libGDX uses to give to SpriteBatch, that is, in groups of 20 floats per sprite. ColorfulBatch uses 24
704     * floats per sprite, to add tweak per color, so this does some conversion.
705     * @param texture the Texture being drawn from; usually an atlas or some parent Texture with lots of TextureRegions
706     * @param spriteVertices not the same format as {@link #vertices} in this class; should have a length that's a multiple of 20
707     * @param offset where to start drawing vertices from {@code spriteVertices}
708     * @param count how many vertices to draw from {@code spriteVertices} (20 vertices is one sprite)
709     */
710    @Override
711    public void draw (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
712        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
713
714        count = (count / 5) * 6;
715        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
716        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
717        if (texture != lastTexture)
718            switchTexture(texture);
719        else {
720            remainingVertices -= idx;
721            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
722                flush();
723                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
724            }
725        }
726        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
727        final float tweak = this.tweak;
728
729        ////old way, breaks when libGDX code expects SPRITE_SIZE to be 20
730        //System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
731        ////new way, thanks mgsx
732        for (int s = offset, v = idx, i = 0; i < copyCount; i += 6) {
733            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
734            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
735            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
736            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
737            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
738            vertices[v++] = tweak;
739        }
740        idx += copyCount;
741        count -= copyCount;
742        while (count > 0) {
743            offset += (copyCount / 6) * 5;
744            flush();
745            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
746            ////old way, breaks when libGDX code expects SPRITE_SIZE to be 20
747            //System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
748            ////new way, thanks mgsx
749            for (int s = offset, v = 0, i = 0; i < copyCount; i += 6) {
750                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
751                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
752                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
753                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
754                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
755                vertices[v++] = tweak;
756            }
757            idx += copyCount;
758            count -= copyCount;
759        }
760    }
761
762    /**
763     * Meant for code that uses ColorfulBatch specifically and can set an extra float (for the color tweak) per vertex,
764     * this is just like {@link #draw(Texture, float[], int, int)} when used in other Batch implementations, but expects
765     * {@code spriteVertices} to have a length that is a multiple of 24 instead of 20.
766     * @param texture the Texture being drawn from; usually an atlas or some parent Texture with lots of TextureRegions
767     * @param spriteVertices vertices formatted as this class uses them; length should be a multiple of 24
768     * @param offset where to start drawing vertices from {@code spriteVertices}
769     * @param count how many vertices to draw from {@code spriteVertices} (24 vertices is one sprite)
770     */
771    public void drawExactly (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
772        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
773
774        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
775        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
776        if (texture != lastTexture)
777            switchTexture(texture);
778        else {
779            remainingVertices -= idx;
780            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
781                flush();
782                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
783            }
784        }
785        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
786
787        System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
788        idx += copyCount;
789        count -= copyCount;
790        while (count > 0) {
791            offset += copyCount;
792            flush();
793            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
794            System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
795            idx += copyCount;
796            count -= copyCount;
797        }
798    }
799
800    @Override
801    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y) {
802        draw(region, x, y, region.getRegionWidth(), region.getRegionHeight());
803    }
804
805    @Override
806    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
807        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
808
809        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
810
811        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
812        if (texture != lastTexture) {
813            switchTexture(texture);
814        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
815            flush();
816        }
817        final float fx2 = x + width;
818        final float fy2 = y + height;
819        final float u = region.getU();
820        final float v = region.getV2();
821        final float u2 = region.getU2();
822        final float v2 = region.getV();
823
824        final float color = this.color;
825        final float tweak = this.tweak;
826        final int idx = this.idx;
827        vertices[idx] = x;
828        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
829        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
830        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
831        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
832        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
833
834        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
835        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
836        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
837        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
838        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
839        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
840
841        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
842        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
843        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
844        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
845        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
846        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
847
848        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
849        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
850        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
851        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
852        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
853        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
854        this.idx = idx + 24;
855    }
856
857    @Override
858    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
859                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation) {
860        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
861
862        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
863
864        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
865        if (texture != lastTexture) {
866            switchTexture(texture);
867        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
868            flush();
869
870        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
871        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
872        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
873        float fx = -originX;
874        float fy = -originY;
875        float fx2 = width - originX;
876        float fy2 = height - originY;
877
878        // scale
879        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
880            fx *= scaleX;
881            fy *= scaleY;
882            fx2 *= scaleX;
883            fy2 *= scaleY;
884        }
885
886        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
887        final float p1x = fx;
888        final float p1y = fy;
889        final float p2x = fx;
890        final float p2y = fy2;
891        final float p3x = fx2;
892        final float p3y = fy2;
893        final float p4x = fx2;
894        final float p4y = fy;
895
896        float x1;
897        float y1;
898        float x2;
899        float y2;
900        float x3;
901        float y3;
902        float x4;
903        float y4;
904
905        // rotate
906        if (rotation != 0) {
907            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
908            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
909
910            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
911            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
912
913            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
914            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
915
916            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
917            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
918
919            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
920            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
921        } else {
922            x1 = p1x;
923            y1 = p1y;
924
925            x2 = p2x;
926            y2 = p2y;
927
928            x3 = p3x;
929            y3 = p3y;
930
931            x4 = p4x;
932            y4 = p4y;
933        }
934
935        x1 += worldOriginX;
936        y1 += worldOriginY;
937        x2 += worldOriginX;
938        y2 += worldOriginY;
939        x3 += worldOriginX;
940        y3 += worldOriginY;
941        x4 += worldOriginX;
942        y4 += worldOriginY;
943
944        final float u = region.getU();
945        final float v = region.getV2();
946        final float u2 = region.getU2();
947        final float v2 = region.getV();
948
949        final float color = this.color;
950        final float tweak = this.tweak;
951        final int idx = this.idx;
952        vertices[idx] = x1;
953        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
954        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
955        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
956        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
957        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
958
959        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
960        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
961        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
962        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
963        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
964        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
965
966        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
967        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
968        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
969        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
970        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
971        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
972
973        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
974        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
975        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
976        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
977        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
978        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
979        this.idx = idx + 24;
980    }
981
982    @Override
983    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
984                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation, boolean clockwise) {
985        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
986
987        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
988
989        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
990        if (texture != lastTexture) {
991            switchTexture(texture);
992        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
993            flush();
994
995        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
996        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
997        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
998        float fx = -originX;
999        float fy = -originY;
1000        float fx2 = width - originX;
1001        float fy2 = height - originY;
1002
1003        // scale
1004        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
1005            fx *= scaleX;
1006            fy *= scaleY;
1007            fx2 *= scaleX;
1008            fy2 *= scaleY;
1009        }
1010
1011        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
1012        final float p1x = fx;
1013        final float p1y = fy;
1014        final float p2x = fx;
1015        final float p2y = fy2;
1016        final float p3x = fx2;
1017        final float p3y = fy2;
1018        final float p4x = fx2;
1019        final float p4y = fy;
1020
1021        float x1;
1022        float y1;
1023        float x2;
1024        float y2;
1025        float x3;
1026        float y3;
1027        float x4;
1028        float y4;
1029
1030        // rotate
1031        if (rotation != 0) {
1032            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
1033            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
1034
1035            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
1036            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
1037
1038            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
1039            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
1040
1041            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
1042            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
1043
1044            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
1045            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
1046        } else {
1047            x1 = p1x;
1048            y1 = p1y;
1049
1050            x2 = p2x;
1051            y2 = p2y;
1052
1053            x3 = p3x;
1054            y3 = p3y;
1055
1056            x4 = p4x;
1057            y4 = p4y;
1058        }
1059
1060        x1 += worldOriginX;
1061        y1 += worldOriginY;
1062        x2 += worldOriginX;
1063        y2 += worldOriginY;
1064        x3 += worldOriginX;
1065        y3 += worldOriginY;
1066        x4 += worldOriginX;
1067        y4 += worldOriginY;
1068
1069        float u1, v1, u2, v2, u3, v3, u4, v4;
1070        if (clockwise) {
1071            u1 = region.getU2();
1072            v1 = region.getV2();
1073            u2 = region.getU();
1074            v2 = region.getV2();
1075            u3 = region.getU();
1076            v3 = region.getV();
1077            u4 = region.getU2();
1078            v4 = region.getV();
1079        } else {
1080            u1 = region.getU();
1081            v1 = region.getV();
1082            u2 = region.getU2();
1083            v2 = region.getV();
1084            u3 = region.getU2();
1085            v3 = region.getV2();
1086            u4 = region.getU();
1087            v4 = region.getV2();
1088        }
1089
1090        final float color = this.color;
1091        final float tweak = this.tweak;
1092        final int idx = this.idx;
1093        vertices[idx] = x1;
1094        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
1095        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
1096        vertices[idx + 3] = u1;
1097        vertices[idx + 4] = v1;
1098        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
1099
1100        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
1101        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
1102        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
1103        vertices[idx + 9] = u2;
1104        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
1105        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
1106
1107        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
1108        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
1109        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
1110        vertices[idx + 15] = u3;
1111        vertices[idx + 16] = v3;
1112        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
1113
1114        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
1115        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
1116        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
1117        vertices[idx + 21] = u4;
1118        vertices[idx + 22] = v4;
1119        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
1120        this.idx = idx + 24;
1121    }
1122
1123    @Override
1124    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float width, float height, Affine2 transform) {
1125        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
1126
1127        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
1128
1129        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
1130        if (texture != lastTexture) {
1131            switchTexture(texture);
1132        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
1133            flush();
1134        }
1135
1136        // construct corner points
1137        float x1 = transform.m02;
1138        float y1 = transform.m12;
1139        float x2 = transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
1140        float y2 = transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
1141        float x3 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
1142        float y3 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
1143        float x4 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m02;
1144        float y4 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m12;
1145
1146        float u = region.getU();
1147        float v = region.getV2();
1148        float u2 = region.getV2();
1149        float v2 = region.getV();
1150
1151        final float color = this.color;
1152        final float tweak = this.tweak;
1153        final int idx = this.idx;
1154        vertices[idx] = x1;
1155        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
1156        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
1157        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
1158        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
1159        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
1160
1161        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
1162        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
1163        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
1164        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
1165        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
1166        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
1167
1168        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
1169        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
1170        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
1171        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
1172        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
1173        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
1174
1175        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
1176        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
1177        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
1178        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
1179        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
1180        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
1181        this.idx = idx + 24;
1182    }
1183
1184    @SuppressWarnings("RedundantCast") // These casts are absolutely not redundant! Java 9 changed Buffer ABI.
1185    @Override
1186    public void flush () {
1187        if (idx == 0) return;
1188
1189        renderCalls++;
1190        totalRenderCalls++;
1191        int spritesInBatch = idx / SPRITE_SIZE;
1192        if (spritesInBatch > maxSpritesInBatch) maxSpritesInBatch = spritesInBatch;
1193        int count = spritesInBatch * 6;
1194
1195        lastTexture.bind();
1196        Mesh mesh = this.mesh;
1197        mesh.setVertices(vertices, 0, idx);
1198        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).position(0);
1199        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).limit(count);
1200
1201        if (blendingDisabled) {
1202            Gdx.gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1203        } else {
1204            Gdx.gl.glEnable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1205            if (blendSrcFunc != -1) Gdx.gl.glBlendFuncSeparate(blendSrcFunc, blendDstFunc, blendSrcFuncAlpha, blendDstFuncAlpha);
1206        }
1207
1208        mesh.render(customShader != null ? customShader : shader, GL20.GL_TRIANGLES, 0, count);
1209
1210        idx = 0;
1211    }
1212
1213    @Override
1214    public void disableBlending () {
1215        if (blendingDisabled) return;
1216        flush();
1217        blendingDisabled = true;
1218    }
1219
1220    @Override
1221    public void enableBlending () {
1222        if (!blendingDisabled) return;
1223        flush();
1224        blendingDisabled = false;
1225    }
1226
1227    @Override
1228    public void setBlendFunction (int srcFunc, int dstFunc) {
1229        setBlendFunctionSeparate(srcFunc, dstFunc, srcFunc, dstFunc);
1230    }
1231
1232    @Override
1233    public void setBlendFunctionSeparate(int srcFuncColor, int dstFuncColor, int srcFuncAlpha, int dstFuncAlpha) {
1234        if (blendSrcFunc == srcFuncColor && blendDstFunc == dstFuncColor && blendSrcFuncAlpha == srcFuncAlpha && blendDstFuncAlpha == dstFuncAlpha) return;
1235        flush();
1236        blendSrcFunc = srcFuncColor;
1237        blendDstFunc = dstFuncColor;
1238        blendSrcFuncAlpha = srcFuncAlpha;
1239        blendDstFuncAlpha = dstFuncAlpha;
1240    }
1241
1242    @Override
1243    public int getBlendSrcFunc () {
1244        return blendSrcFunc;
1245    }
1246
1247    @Override
1248    public int getBlendDstFunc () {
1249        return blendDstFunc;
1250    }
1251
1252    @Override
1253    public int getBlendSrcFuncAlpha() {
1254        return blendSrcFuncAlpha;
1255    }
1256
1257    @Override
1258    public int getBlendDstFuncAlpha() {
1259        return blendDstFuncAlpha;
1260    }
1261
1262    @Override
1263    public void dispose () {
1264        mesh.dispose();
1265        if (ownsShader && shader != null) shader.dispose();
1266    }
1267
1268    @Override
1269    public Matrix4 getProjectionMatrix () {
1270        return projectionMatrix;
1271    }
1272
1273    @Override
1274    public Matrix4 getTransformMatrix () {
1275        return transformMatrix;
1276    }
1277
1278    @Override
1279    public void setProjectionMatrix (Matrix4 projection) {
1280        if (drawing) flush();
1281        projectionMatrix.set(projection);
1282        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1283    }
1284
1285    @Override
1286    public void setTransformMatrix (Matrix4 transform) {
1287        if (drawing) flush();
1288        transformMatrix.set(transform);
1289        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1290    }
1291
1292    protected void setupMatrices () {
1293        combinedMatrix.set(projectionMatrix).mul(transformMatrix);
1294        if (customShader != null) {
1295            customShader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1296            customShader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1297        } else {
1298            shader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1299            shader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1300        }
1301    }
1302
1303    protected void switchTexture (Texture texture) {
1304        flush();
1305        lastTexture = texture;
1306        invTexWidth = 1.0f / texture.getWidth();
1307        invTexHeight = 1.0f / texture.getHeight();
1308    }
1309
1310    @Override
1311    public void setShader (ShaderProgram shader) {
1312        if (drawing) {
1313            flush();
1314        }
1315        customShader = shader;
1316        if (drawing) {
1317            if (customShader != null)
1318                customShader.bind();
1319            else
1320                this.shader.bind();
1321            setupMatrices();
1322        }
1323    }
1324
1325    @Override
1326    public ShaderProgram getShader () {
1327        if (customShader == null) {
1328            return shader;
1329        }
1330        return customShader;
1331    }
1332
1333    @Override
1334    public boolean isBlendingEnabled () {
1335        return !blendingDisabled;
1336    }
1337
1338    public boolean isDrawing () {
1339        return drawing;
1340    }
1341    static public final int X1 = 0;
1342    static public final int Y1 = 1;
1343    static public final int C1 = 2;
1344    static public final int U1 = 3;
1345    static public final int V1 = 4;
1346    static public final int T1 = 5;
1347    static public final int X2 = 6;
1348    static public final int Y2 = 7;
1349    static public final int C2 = 8;
1350    static public final int U2 = 9;
1351    static public final int V2 = 10;
1352    static public final int T2 = 11;
1353    static public final int X3 = 12;
1354    static public final int Y3 = 13;
1355    static public final int C3 = 14;
1356    static public final int U3 = 15;
1357    static public final int V3 = 16;
1358    static public final int T3 = 17;
1359    static public final int X4 = 18;
1360    static public final int Y4 = 19;
1361    static public final int C4 = 20;
1362    static public final int U4 = 21;
1363    static public final int V4 = 22;
1364    static public final int T4 = 23;
1365}
